posts.name: EricH
posts.cooked: Have you tried to see if your existing Coral mechanism can be used to knock Algae out of the Reef?
Open Alliance might help. Just look it up on Chief Delphi and you’ll find a bunch of teams sharing their designs and stuff.
yes it work but not consistent and take alot of time
i tryed but did not find desine for only alge out that are simpel we have cnc and 3d printers and everything but i need sumthing that i can build and program fast
1619’s mechanism – a spinning flywheel – seems fairly simple, perhaps something like that?
